text: The Ice House may refer to: * The Ice House (novel), a 1992 novel by Minette Walters * The Ice House (comedy club), a California comedy club * The Ice House (1978 film), a BBC drama featured as A Ghost Story for Christmas * The Ice House (1969 film), an American trash/horror/thriller film * The Ice House (St. Petersburg), an Ice House built in January 1740 in Russia. ==See also== * Icehouse (disambiguation)
title: The Ice House
